name: Expected frequency of collocation
disambiguatingDescription: Is the product of establishing the random co-occurrence base-line, and can be calculated by multiplying node frequency by collocate frequency and dividing this by the number of tokens in the text or corpus.
description: Is the product of establishing the random co-occurrence base-line, and can be calculated by multiplying node frequency by collocate frequency and dividing this by the number of tokens in the text or corpus.
